items.title: What services do you offer?
items.content: We diagnose, repair and configure computers, laptops, peripherals and network equipment. We also help with software and system updates.

items.title: How can I contact you?
items.content: After filling out the application, we will contact you ourselves at the specified e-mail. You can also write to us by email or through the internal portal.

items.title: How secure is my data?
items.content: Your personal data is only used to process the application. They are stored securely and are not shared with third parties.

items.title: How long does it take to renovate?
items.content: The lead time depends on the complexity of the problem, usually between 3 and 7 business days. In difficult cases, the terms are agreed individually.

items.title: Can I cancel my application?
items.content: Yes, just let us know via email or in response to a message from our employee.
